Params: {3: 'Noctis presses a button on his left shoulder, causing an explosion nearby.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Did I tell you that this is actually the biggest bomb on me? Don't worry! My arm is also the most blast-proof part of my body.", 4: '1', 18: '100003302'}
{3: 'No. 21 easily shreds the steel railing with her claws.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I thought we agreed to a real fight yesterday!', 4: '1', 18: '100003305'}
{3: 'The guard immediately jumps back up. Just as he is about to punch, Noctis has already thrown him against the wall.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Action Star', 3: "Don't pull your punches when the time comes. We've stopped rehearsing action moves since we were awakened. A good actor knows how to get hit! I'll be prepared! Oh, and I just came up with a new name for myself!", 4: '1', 18: '100003306'}
{3: 'Vera picks up her banner spear from the corner and tosses the claw blades to No. 21.'}
{3: "Meanwhile, the mechanoids blocking your way are carrying Noctis' arm with them. They are immediately subdued, and Noctis quickly attaches his mechanical arm back."}
